meanings.definition: Not restricted to or associated with any particular religious denomination.
meanings.sent1: The community center hosted an undenominational event that welcomed people of all faiths.
meanings.sent2: The undenominational chapel was open to everyone, regardless of their religious beliefs.
meanings.sent3: The undenominational picnic brought together people from various religions for a day of fun and food.
meanings.sent4: Her undenominational approach to spirituality embraced the diversity of beliefs in the community.
meanings.sent5: The undenominational message of love and acceptance resonated with people of all faiths.

meanings.definition: A person or organization that is not affiliated with any specific religious denomination.
meanings.sent1: She considered herself an undenominational, choosing to explore spirituality independently.
meanings.sent2: The undenominational group provided support to individuals seeking a non-denominational community.
meanings.sent3: The undenominational activist advocated for inclusivity and unity among all religious groups.
meanings.sent4: As an undenominational, he respected the beliefs of others without aligning with a specific denomination.
meanings.sent5: The undenominational organization offered a welcoming space for those seeking spiritual exploration.
